SEARCH
Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.Managers

Class CollisionManager

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.Managers.CollisionManager
public class CollisionManager extends Object
CollisionManager class manages collisions between various actors. It handles collisions detection, applying damage and managing destruction of actors.

    • root

      private javafx.scene.Group root

    • screenWidth

      private double screenWidth

  • Constructor Details

    • CollisionManager

      public CollisionManager(javafx.scene.Group root, double screenWidth)
      Constructs the CollisionManager for collision detection management.
      Parameters:
      root - : root Group which holds all game objects.
      screenWidth - : width of screen for collision detection logic.

  • Method Details

    • handlePlaneCollisions

      public void handlePlaneCollisions(List<ActiveActorDestructible> actors1, List<ActiveActorDestructible> actors2)
      Handles collisions between two sets of actors If any two actors intersect, both of them take damage.
      Parameters:
      actors1 - : the first set of actors for collision check.
      actors2 - : the second set of actors for collision check.

    • handleProjectileCollisions

      public void handleProjectileCollisions(List<ActiveActorDestructible> projectiles, List<ActiveActorDestructible> targets, UserPlane user)
      Handles collisions between projectiles and targets When projectile hits a target, projectile and target take damage. Increments kill count and removes the target, If a target is destroyed.
      Parameters:
      projectiles - : list of projectiles.
      targets - : list of target actors.
      user - : the player's plane.

    • handleEnemyPenetration

      public void handleEnemyPenetration(List<ActiveActorDestructible> enemies, UserPlane user)
      Handles situation where enemies plane penetrate the player's defense line. If an enemy plane passes the screen boundary, it will deal damage to player and be removed.
      Parameters:
      enemies - : list of enemy actors for penetration check.
      user - : player's plane take damage if an enemy penetrates defense line.

    • handleDamage

      private void handleDamage(ActiveActorDestructible actor1, ActiveActorDestructible actor2)
      Applies damage to two actors if both collides.
      Parameters:
      actor1 - : first actor to take damage.
      actor2 - : second actor to take damage.

    • handleTargetDestruction

      private void handleTargetDestruction(ActiveActorDestructible target, UserPlane user, List<ActiveActorDestructible> targetsToRemove)
      Handles destruction of the target when it's hit by projectile. Player's kill count is incremented, then target is marked as counted to prevent multiple kills count.
      Parameters:
      target - : target actor that has been destroyed.
      user - : Player's plane to increment kill count.
      targetsToRemove - : the list storing targets that need to be removed.

    • removeActors

      private void removeActors(List<ActiveActorDestructible> actorsToRemove, List<ActiveActorDestructible> actorList)
      Removes actors from both root Group and actor list.
      Parameters:
      actorsToRemove - : list of actors to be removed.
      actorList - : the actor list to remove from.

    • enemyHasPenetratedDefenses

      private boolean enemyHasPenetratedDefenses(ActiveActorDestructible enemy)
      Checks if enemy has penetrated the player's defense line.
      Parameters:
      enemy - : enemy actor to check.
      Returns:
      true if enemy has penetrated the defense line, false otherwise.
